summary: Project now includes a mobile UI scaling control via a settings button to adjust UI size by percentage.

existing_features.title: Add a Settings control (button with popover/dialog) inside the Session sidebar header area at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1]/aside[1]/div[1] that lets the user adjust overall UI size by percentage.
Persist the selected UI scale percentage as a user preference in localStorage and restore it on app load.
Apply the chosen UI scale percentage to the app UI so that the interface becomes smaller/larger consistently (not just the sidebar), without breaking scrolling/overflow in the Session page layout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a settings button that lets users adjust UI size by percentage (for better mobile layout).
